MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth, affecting properties in Lon Felin and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.51pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.28Am on 17th March 2021.
